Usage
=====

Installation
------------

To use Spy4Cast, first install it using git:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ git clone https://github.com/pabloduran016/Spy4Cast.git

After that, navigate to the folder and install dependencies

.. code-block:: console

    (.venv) $ cd Spy4Cast
    (.venv) $ pip install -r requirements.txt
